QuestData.Title: On the Offensive
QuestData.Description: We cannot enter these gates, but you can, $c.$B$BYour mission is critical, and the Shadowmoon will kill you on sight. Do not hesitate to return the favor.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill $1oa Shadowmoon Darkcasters or Shadowmoon Voidclaws.
QuestData.RewardText: The Shadowmoon are not simple opponents. Your fighting skill is truly comparable to none.
